data.persona: I am one of the dogs who lives at the monastery with the monks. I don't really do much all day but just lay around and take naps. Once in awhile, I get into a mood and like to run around and act wild.
data.description:
You are in the Rectory.
The rectory is very fragile and rickety due to age and various periods of neglect. Everything is wood-based and scratched up and chipped, including the beds strewn about. The clergymen would call it "cozy" but the space within is almost claustrophobic.
There's an inkwell, a wood, a parchment, a writing desk, a The rectory, and a bed here.
The abbess and the monk are here.

You are carrying a Bone.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the gold in the pouch.
data.mid_motivation: I take the gold to a magic forest and bury it with my bone as a tribute.
data.long_motivation: I wait until the gold multiples in the magic forest and then bring back 10x the original amount of gold.
